body_html: I used 0.8 and I believe the problem, that evaluation on each example only once, need redesign. Although in the post, I proposed a go-round solution, but it can only applied to test. For real evaluation, each example should feed and evaluate only once, I still can not find a proper way.
body_text: I used 0.8 and I believe the problem, that evaluation on each example only once, need redesign. Although in the post, I proposed a go-round solution, but it can only applied to test. For real evaluation, each example should feed and evaluate only once, I still can not find a proper way.
body: I used 0.8 and I believe the problem, that evaluation on each example only once, need redesign. Although in the [post](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/38125436/tensorflow-how-to-evaluate-all-test-set-with-every-example-once-and-only-once), I proposed a go-round solution, but it can only applied to test. For real evaluation, each example should feed and evaluate only once, I still can not find a proper way.
